name: Death Ticker
description:
Made for Mini Jam 97: Simulation

You suddenly wake up inside a simulation. A robot voice greets you. You have a bomb on your back and if you move, it will explode after 2 seconds. The only way to make the timer go back up is to stop moving. B̸u̸t̷ ̶s̸o̵m̸e̷t̷h̷i̵n̸g̸ ̶f̵e̸e̷l̷s̶ ̸o̴f̵f̶.̴.̸.̴  :)

Download the game for a better experience. (No constant audio glitching, better resolution, better performance etc...) I would recommend you to only play HTML if you are unable to download and play it (if you have a Mac for example)

If your are playing in HTML, use fullscreen for the best experience.

Good luck!
